mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, NAME, SEX, CERT_NO, CELL, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED, MEMO
mapper.insert:
insert into user
ID,
USER_ID,
NAME,
SEX,
CERT_NO,
CELL,
GMT_CREATE,
GMT_MODIFIED,
MEMO,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},

mapper.update:
update user
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CELL = #{cell,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GMT_CREATE = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERT_NO = #{certNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CELL = #{cell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMT_CREATE = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MEMO = #{memo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT ID, USER_ID, NAME, SEX, CERT_NO, CELL, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED, MEMO FROM user where CERT_NO =#{certNo}

SELECT ID, USER_ID, NAME, SEX, CERT_NO, CELL, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFIED, MEMO FROM user where 1=1
NAME = #{userName},
CELL = #{cell},
